intro: Phyllorkis hymenantha, commonly known as the narrow-leafed rock heath, is a flowering plant native to the south-western regions of Australia. It belongs to the family Epacridaceae, which includes many species of heath and related shrubs. Phyllorkis hymenantha is often found in open woodlands and heathlands, where it plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for local fauna.
